name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OKKI io Foreign trade customer development email address search tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OKKI.io Easy and user-friendly foreign trade customer acquisition plugin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ü§îü§î What is OKKI io?
OKKI io is a plugin tool that helps customers search for key information and conduct background checks. When browsing scenarios such as LinkedIn/Facebook/corporate websites, it can quickly obtain leads and identify customers more accurately.
‚úÖ Capture potential overseas customer information: When browsing the official website/social media homepage of overseas target customers, we automatically help you capture clues and verify your email address
‚úÖ Identifying key contacts: Quickly locate key contacts of target customers, automatically match information to complete contact information (position, email, Whatsapp, etc.)
‚úÖ Batch add friends/message group: After obtaining valuable overseas target customers, you can batch add friends/message group to help you quickly expand your network
‚ÄºÔ∏è Heavy news ‚ÄºÔ∏è
üéâüéâOKKI Leads AI The trial version has been launched and is now available for free use!
Having two major scenario functions of "customer acquisition" and "marketing", it helps you quickly solve potential customer development, potential customer background investigation, and one click intelligent marketing. At the same time, it integrates the functions of IO plugins to provide a full process marketing customer acquisition solution.
‚úÖ Big data to find potential customers: Potential customers discover and integrate massive buyer data; Continuous automatic mining of potential customers; Activate the past hidden customer upload system for one click marketing
‚úÖ One click intelligent marketing: One click intelligent marketing for potential customers; One click adoption of multiple marketing templates; AI letter writing/polishing generates high-quality copy
‚úÖ Embedded IO plugin: an easy-to-use foreign customer acquisition tool
Usage: Click on the website https://okki-free.xiaoman.cn/ Register with your phone number to start your wonderful experience journey~
For more operation guidelines, you can refer to our official documentation: https://www.yuque.com/help.xiaoman/by11gg/ng1ef79qgcnp2cex#CBdHU
Welcome to join the OKKI family. Please feel free to provide any feedback and help us improve!
